BitField.name: DATATYPE
BitField.description: Data type selection (for data in and data out to/from the cryptographic block)

BitField.name: DMAINEN
BitField.description: Enable DMA management of data input phase

BitField.name: DMAOUTEN
BitField.description: Enable DMA management of data output phase

BitField.name: GCMPH
BitField.description: Used only for GCM, CCM and GMAC algorithms and has no effect when other algorithms are selected

BitField.name: NPBLB
BitField.description: Number of padding bytes in last block of payload

BitField.name: INMESEL
BitField.description: comparator 1 input minus extended selection bits.

BitField.name: INMESEL
BitField.description: comparator 2 input minus extended selection bits.

BitField.name: WAVE1
BitField.description: DAC channel1 noise/triangle wave generation enable

BitField.name: DMAUDRIE1
BitField.description: DAC channel1 DMA Underrun Interrupt enable

Register.name: DHR12L1
Register.description: channel1 12-bit left aligned data holding register

Register.description: channel1 8-bit right aligned data holding register

Register.description: Dual DAC 12-bit right-aligned data holding register

Register.description: Dual DAC 12-bit left aligned data holding register

Register.name: DHR8RD
Register.description: Dual DAC 8-bit right aligned data holding register

BitField.name: BWST1
BitField.description: DAC Channel 1 busy writing sample time flag

Register.name: SHSR1
Register.description: Sample and Hold sample time register 1

BitField.description: DAC Channel 1 sample Time (only valid in Sample and Hold mode)

Register.name: SHHR
Register.description: Sample and Hold hold time register

BitField.name: THOLD1
BitField.description: DAC Channel 1 hold Time (only valid in Sample and Hold mode)

Register.name: SHRR
Register.description: Sample and Hold refresh time register

BitField.name: TREFRESH1
BitField.description: DAC Channel 1 refresh Time (only valid in Sample and Hold mode)

BitField.description: Size of the MPU protection region

BitField.name: BUSY
BitField.description: PKA operation is in progressThis bit is set to 1 whenever START bit in the PKA_CR is set. It is automatically cleared when the computation is complete, meaning that PKA RAM can be safely accessed and a new operation can be started.

BitField.name: PROCENDFC
BitField.description: Clear PKA End of Operation flag
